# Lightify - Custom Neon Signs (Detailed)

A modern website for a custom neon sign business built with Next.js and Tailwind CSS.

## Features

- Responsive design optimized for all devices.
- Modern UI with dark theme and neon aesthetics.
- Portfolio showcase with filtering options (Real-world examples of neon signs).
- Contact form for direct quote requests.
- About page covering the business story and values.

## Technical Stack
- Framework: Next.js (React)
- Styling: Tailwind CSS
- Icons: Heroicons

## Site Map and Links
- Homepage: https://lightify.ro/ - Features hero section, category links, and featured products.
- Portfolio: https://lightify.ro/portofoliu-semne-neon - Gallery of neon sign projects.
- Pricing: https://lightify.ro/preturi-neon-led - Comprehensive list of pricing for different neon sign sizes and types.
- About: https://lightify.ro/despre-noi - Background information on Lightify.
- Contact: https://lightify.ro/contact - Primary point for inquiries and orders.
- Why Us: https://lightify.ro/de-ce-lightify - Highlights reliability, quality, and customization options.

## Business Context
Lightify aims to provide high-quality, energy-efficient neon signs using LED technology. They offer solutions for both commercial branding and home decor.
